stdyInfo.abstract: Metadata for the Religion in India survey conducted by Pew Research Center in 2019 and 2020

var.name: COUNTRY
var.labl: COUNTRY. COUNTRY ID

var.name: QRID
var.labl: QRID. Respondent ID (UNIQUE TO EACH RESPONDENT)

var.name: weight
var.labl: Final Weight

var.name: QMLangRec
var.labl: QMLangRec. [DO NOT READ] Main language of interview? [INTERVIEWER: THIS QUESTION IS NOT TO BE READ TO RESPONDENT. YOU NEED TO RECORD THE MAIN LANGUAGE SELECTED TO CONDUCT THIS INTERVIEW.]

var.name: Q2
var.labl: Q2. How often, if at all, do you follow the news?

var.name: Q3rec_1
var.labl: Q3. How have you been getting the news? Television

var.name: Q3rec_2
var.labl: Q3. How have you been getting the news? Newspapers or magazines

var.name: Q3rec_3
var.labl: Q3. How have you been getting the news? Radio

var.name: Q3rec_4
var.labl: Q3. How have you been getting the news? Internet

var.name: Q3rec_5
var.labl: Q3. How have you been getting the news? Social media (Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp)

var.name: Q3rec_6
var.labl: Q3. How have you been getting the news? Word of mouth, family, friends

var.name: Q3rec_7
var.labl: Q3. How have you been getting the news? Other

var.name: Q3rec_98
var.labl: Q3. How have you been getting the news? DK

var.name: Q3rec_99
var.labl: Q3. How have you been getting the news? Refused

var.name: Q4
var.labl: Q4. Thinking about your current economic situation, how would you describe it?

var.name: Q5
var.labl: Q5. Over the next 12 months, do you expect your economic situation to …?

var.name: Q6a
var.labl: Q6. Now I am going to read you a list of things that may be problems in India. As I read each one, please tell me if you think it is a …. a. Unemployment

var.name: Q6b
var.labl: Q6. Now I am going to read you a list of things that may be problems in India. As I read each one, please tell me if you think it is a …. b. Crime

var.name: Q6c
var.labl: Q6. Now I am going to read you a list of things that may be problems in India. As I read each one, please tell me if you think it is a …. c. Communal violence

var.name: Q6d
var.labl: Q6. Now I am going to read you a list of things that may be problems in India. As I read each one, please tell me if you think it is a …. d. Corruption

var.name: Q6e
var.labl: Q6. Now I am going to read you a list of things that may be problems in India. As I read each one, please tell me if you think it is a …. e. Violence against women

var.name: Q7
var.labl: Q7. To improve the safety of women in our community, which do you think is more important?

catgry.labl: Teaching boys to respect all women
Women are already safe (DO NOT READ)
Improve law and order/Policing (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q9
var.labl: Q9. How important is it for women to have the same rights as men?

var.name: ABORT
var.labl: ABORT. Do you think having an abortion should be …?

var.name: Q10
var.labl: Q10. Some feel that we should rely on a democratic form of government to solve our country’s problems. Others feel that we should rely on a leader with a strong hand to solve our country’s problems. Which comes closer to your opinion?

var.name: Q11ya
var.labl: Q11y. Just your impression, in India today, is there a lot of discrimination against ...? a. Hindus

catgry.labl: No, not a lot of discrimination

var.name: Q11yb
var.labl: Q11y. Just your impression, in India today, is there a lot of discrimination against ...? b. Muslims

catgry.labl: No, not a lot of discrimination

var.name: Q11yc
var.labl: Q11y. Just your impression, in India today, is there a lot of discrimination against ...? c. Christians

catgry.labl: No, not a lot of discrimination

var.name: Q11yd
var.labl: Q11y. Just your impression, in India today, is there a lot of discrimination against ...? d. Sikhs

catgry.labl: No, not a lot of discrimination

var.name: Q11ye
var.labl: Q11y. Just your impression, in India today, is there a lot of discrimination against ...? e. Buddhists

catgry.labl: No, not a lot of discrimination

var.name: Q11yf
var.labl: Q11y. Just your impression, in India today, is there a lot of discrimination against ...? f. Jains

catgry.labl: No, not a lot of discrimination

var.name: Q11yg
var.labl: Q11y. Just your impression, in India today, is there a lot of discrimination against ...? g. Members of Scheduled Castes

catgry.labl: No, not a lot of discrimination

var.name: Q11yh
var.labl: Q11y. Just your impression, in India today, is there a lot of discrimination against ...? h. Members of Scheduled Tribes

catgry.labl: No, not a lot of discrimination

var.name: Q11yi
var.labl: Q11y. Just your impression, in India today, is there a lot of discrimination against ...? i. Members of Other Backward Classes

catgry.labl: No, not a lot of discrimination

var.name: Q11yj
var.labl: Q11y. Just your impression, in India today, is there a lot of discrimination against ...? j. Women

catgry.labl: No, not a lot of discrimination

var.name: Q12
var.labl: Q12. How much influence should politicians have in religious matters?

var.name: Q13
var.labl: Q13. Nowadays, would you say that your health is …?

var.name: Q14a
var.labl: Q14. In general, when you or someone in your family has health problems, how much do you trust ... for treatment? a. ayurveda or home remedies

var.name: Q14b
var.labl: Q14. In general, when you or someone in your family has health problems, how much do you trust ... for treatment? b. religious ritual

var.name: Q14c
var.labl: Q14. In general, when you or someone in your family has health problems, how much do you trust ... for treatment? c. homeopathy

var.name: Q14d
var.labl: Q14. In general, when you or someone in your family has health problems, how much do you trust ... for treatment? d. medical science

var.name: Q15
var.labl: Q15. How acceptable or unacceptable is it to get a checkup using modern methods to balance the number of girls and boys in the family?

var.name: Q17a
var.labl: Q17. In India today, how free are …? a. people of other religions to practice their religion

catgry.labl: Not religious/Do not practice religion/Other/Depends (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q17b
var.labl: Q17. In India today, how free are …? b. you to practice your religion

catgry.labl: Not religious/Do not practice religion/Other/Depends (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q18a
var.labl: Q18. How much do you know about …? a. the Hindu religion and its practices

var.name: Q18b
var.labl: Q18. How much do you know about …? b. the Muslim religion and its practices

var.name: Q18c
var.labl: Q18. How much do you know about …? c. the Christian religion and its practices

var.name: Q18d
var.labl: Q18. How much do you know about …? d. the Jain religion and its practices

var.name: Q18e
var.labl: Q18. How much do you know about …? e. the Sikh religion and its practices

var.name: Q18f
var.labl: Q18. How much do you know about …? f. the Buddhist religion and its practices

var.name: Q19a
var.labl: Q19. How important is it for a family to have at least one …? a. son

var.name: Q19b
var.labl: Q19. How important is it for a family to have at least one …? b. daughter

var.name: QW21a
var.labl: QW21. How important is it to stop women in your community from marrying into another …? a. caste

var.name: QW21b
var.labl: QW21. How important is it to stop women in your community from marrying into another …? b. religion

var.name: QM21a
var.labl: QM21. How important is it to stop men in your community from marrying into another …? a. caste

var.name: QM21b
var.labl: QM21. How important is it to stop men in your community from marrying into another …? b. religion

var.name: Q22a
var.labl: Q22. In a family, who should be primarily responsible for …? a. earning money

var.name: Q22b
var.labl: Q22. In a family, who should be primarily responsible for …? b. taking care of children

var.name: Q22c
var.labl: Q22. In a family, who should be primarily responsible for …? c. making decisions about expenses

var.name: Q23a
var.labl: Q23. Please tell me whether you completely agree, mostly agree, mostly disagree or completely disagree with the following statements. a. A wife must always obey her husband

var.name: Q23b
var.labl: Q23. Please tell me whether you completely agree, mostly agree, mostly disagree or completely disagree with the following statements. b. When there are few jobs, men should have more rights to a job than women

var.name: Q24
var.labl: Q24. In your opinion, who should have a greater right to parents’ inheritance?

var.name: Q26
var.labl: Q26. Which of these three statements comes closest to your opinion?

catgry.labl: Men generally make better political leaders than women [OR]
Women generally make better political leaders than men [OR]
In general, women and men make equally good political leaders

var.name: QRELSING
var.labl: QRELSING. What is your present religion, if any? Are you Hindu, Muslim, Christian, Sikh, Buddhist, Jain, some other religion or have no religion?

var.name: QCASTE
var.labl: QCASTE. Are you from a …?

catgry.labl: I do not/my religion does not recognize a caste system (DO NOT READ)
Not a member of any caste/category/class (DO NOT READ)

var.name: QCASTEb
var.labl: QCASTEb. Are you …?

var.name: QHINDU
var.labl: QHINDU. I would like to ask you about some sects within Hinduism. It is possible that some of these may not be familiar to you. Which, if any, of the sects do you identify with?

var.name: QSECTrec
var.labl: QSECT. Are you …?

var.name: QDENOMrec
var.labl: QDENOM. Please tell me which denomination or church, if any, you identify with MOST CLOSELY?

catgry.labl: No denomination or church in particular

var.name: QSIKHrec
var.labl: QSIKH. I would like to ask you about some sects within Sikhism. It is possible that some of these may not be familiar to you. Which, if any, of the sects do you identify with?

var.name: QBUDDHISTrec
var.labl: QBUDDHIST. I would like to ask you about some orders within Buddhism. It is possible that some of these may not be familiar to you. Which, if any, of the orders do you identify with?

var.name: QJAIN
var.labl: QJAIN. I would like to ask you about some schools of thought or traditions within Jainism. It is possible that some of these may not be familiar to you. Which, if any, of the schools of thought or traditions do you identify with?

catgry.labl: Some other school of thought or tradition [SPECIFY QJAINb] [OR]
No school of thought or tradition in particular

var.name: QSUFIrec
var.labl: QSUFI. I would like to ask you about some orders within Sufiism. It is possible that some of these may not be familiar to you. Do you follow any Sufi order, such as …?

var.name: Q28rec
var.labl: Q28rec. To you personally, is being [QRELSING]...? Mainly a matter or religion, mainly a matter of ancestry, or mainly a matter of culture (SELECT UP TO THREE)

var.name: Q29a
var.labl: Q29. Is ... a very important, somewhat important, not too important or not at all important part of what being [QRELSING] means to you? a. respecting elders

var.name: Q29b
var.labl: Q29. Is ... a very important, somewhat important, not too important or not at all important part of what being [QRELSING] means to you? b. believing in God

var.name: q29cdrec
var.labl: Q29. Is ... a very important, somewhat important, not too important or not at all important part of what being [INSERT QRELSING] means to you? cdrec. [praying/offering namaz]

var.name: Q29e
var.labl: Q29. Is ... a very important, somewhat important, not too important or not at all important part of what being [QRELSING] means to you? e. helping the poor and needy

var.name: Q29f
var.labl: Q29. Is ... a very important, somewhat important, not too important or not at all important part of what being [QRELSING] means to you? f. respecting other religions

var.name: Q29g
var.labl: Q29. Is ... a very important, somewhat important, not too important or not at all important part of what being [QRELSING] means to you? g. being born into a [QRELSING] family

var.name: Q29h
var.labl: Q29. Is ... a very important, somewhat important, not too important or not at all important part of what being [QRELSING] means to you? h. respecting India

var.name: Q30a
var.labl: Q30. In your opinion, can a person be [INSERT QRELSING] if they ...? a. show disrespect to elders

catgry.labl: Depends on the situation (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q30b
var.labl: Q30. In your opinion, can a person be [INSERT QRELSING] if they ...? b. do not believe in God

catgry.labl: Depends on the situation (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q30c
var.labl: Q30. In your opinion, can a person be [INSERT QRELSING] if they ...? c. never go to [temple/mosque/church/gurudwara]

catgry.labl: Depends on the situation (DO NOT READ)

var.name: q30derec
var.labl: Q30. In your opinion, can a person be [INSERT QRELSING] if they ...? derec. [never perform prayers/ never offer namaz]

catgry.labl: Depends on the situation (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q30f
var.labl: Q30. In your opinion, can a person be [INSERT QRELSING] if they ...? f. eat beef

catgry.labl: Depends on the situation (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q30g
var.labl: Q30. In your opinion, can a person be [INSERT QRELSING] if they ...? g. eat pork

catgry.labl: Depends on the situation (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q30h
var.labl: Q30. In your opinion, can a person be [INSERT QRELSING] if they ...? h. do not celebrate [QRELSING] festivals

catgry.labl: Depends on the situation (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q30i
var.labl: Q30. In your opinion, can a person be [INSERT QRELSING] if they ...? i. celebrate Christmas

catgry.labl: Depends on the situation (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q30j
var.labl: Q30. In your opinion, can a person be [INSERT QRELSING] if they ...? j. celebrate Eid

catgry.labl: Depends on the situation (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q30k
var.labl: Q30. In your opinion, can a person be [INSERT QRELSING] if they ...? k. celebrate Diwali

catgry.labl: Depends on the situation (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q30l
var.labl: Q30. In your opinion, can a person be [INSERT QRELSING] if they ...? l. disrespect India

catgry.labl: Depends on the situation (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q3132rec
var.labl: Q3132rec. [IF CHRISTIAN: Aside from weddings and funerals,] how often do you [go to the temple/attend the mosque for namaz/go to the gurudwara/attend religious services]?

var.name: Q33a
var.labl: Q33. Have you ever prayed, meditated or performed a ritual at a ...? a. Hindu temple

var.name: Q33b
var.labl: Q33. Have you ever prayed, meditated or performed a ritual at a ...? b. Mosque

var.name: Q33c
var.labl: Q33. Have you ever prayed, meditated or performed a ritual at a ...? c. Church

var.name: Q33d
var.labl: Q33. Have you ever prayed, meditated or performed a ritual at a ...? d. Gurudwara

var.name: Q33e
var.labl: Q33. Have you ever prayed, meditated or performed a ritual at a ...? e. Buddhist stupa

var.name: Q33f
var.labl: Q33. Have you ever prayed, meditated or performed a ritual at a ...? f. Sufi shrine

var.name: Q34a
var.labl: Q34. How often do you ..., if at all? a. meditate

var.name: Q34b
var.labl: Q34. How often do you ..., if at all? b. practice yoga

var.name: Q35
var.labl: Q35. How important is religion in your life?

var.name: Q36a
var.labl: Q36. Have you ever …? a. made a pilgrimage

var.name: Q36b
var.labl: Q36. Have you ever …? b. participated in or witnessed animal sacrifices for religious purposes

var.name: Q36c
var.labl: Q36. Have you ever …? c. received purification by taking a dip in a holy body of water, like the Ganges River

var.name: Q37a
var.labl: Q37. Do you …? a. give money to a [temple/mosque/church/gurudwara/house of worship]

var.name: Q37b
var.labl: Q37. Do you …? b. give money to any other charitable causes

var.name: Q37c
var.labl: Q37. Do you …? c. have an altar, shrine or religious symbol in your home for worship

var.name: Q37d
var.labl: Q37. Do you …? d. ever invite [a pundit or learned person/a monk or learned person/a priest or pastor/an imam/a religious leader] to conduct religious rites at your home

var.name: Q37e
var.labl: Q37. Do you …? e. sing devotionally

var.name: Q37f
var.labl: Q37. Do you …? f. dance devotionally

var.name: Q37g
var.labl: Q37. Do you …? g. fast

var.name: Q37h
var.labl: Q37. Do you …? h. have holy basil at home

var.name: Q37i
var.labl: Q37. Do you …? i. fix important dates, such as for a wedding, based on auspicious times or dates

var.name: Q38
var.labl: Q38. Do you currently follow a guru, pir or baba?

catgry.labl: My family follows one, but I do not (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q39a
var.labl: Q39. How often do you watch ..., if at all? a. Religious programs or serials

var.name: Q39b
var.labl: Q39. How often do you watch …, if at all? b. Other serials

var.name: Q39c
var.labl: Q39. How often do you watch …, if at all? c. News programs

var.name: Q40
var.labl: Q40. Which of these two statements is closest to your opinion?

catgry.labl: My religion is the one true religion

var.name: QCHRELrec
var.labl: QCHRELrec. Now, thinking about when you were a child, in what religion were you raised, if any?

catgry.labl: Childhood religion same as current religion
Childhood religion different from current religion
Do not know/ Refused for current or childhood religion

var.name: Q42
var.labl: Q42. Still thinking about when you were growing up, how important was religion to your family?

var.name: Q43a
var.labl: Q43a. Do you believe in God?

var.name: Q43b
var.labl: Q43b. How certain are you about this belief?

var.name: Q43c
var.labl: Q43c. Do you believe that …?

catgry.labl: There is only one God with many manifestations [OR]

var.name: Q44rec_1
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Ganesha

var.name: Q44rec_2
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Hanuman

var.name: Q44rec_3
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Kali

var.name: Q44rec_4
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Krishna

var.name: Q44rec_5
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Lakshmi

var.name: Q44rec_6
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Lord Ram

var.name: Q44rec_7
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Saraswati

var.name: Q44rec_8
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Shiva

var.name: Q44rec_9
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Vishnu

var.name: Q44rec_10
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Dattatreya

var.name: Q44rec_11
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Ayyappa

var.name: Q44rec_12
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Meenakshi

var.name: Q44rec_13
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Murugan

var.name: Q44rec_14
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, the Sun

var.name: Q44rec_15
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, Jesus

var.name: Q44rec_16
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes, another God

var.name: Q44rec_17
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes believe, No, I do not have a God I feel closest to

var.name: Q44rec_18
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? I have many personal Gods

var.name: Q44rec_98
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes believe, Do not know (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q44rec_99
var.labl: Q44. Do you believe in God? [If yes] Do you feel closest to any God? If so, which one? Yes believe, Refused (DO NOT READ)

var.name: Q45a
var.labl: Q45. Do you think God can be manifested in ...? a. nature, such as mountains, rivers or trees

var.name: Q45b
var.labl: Q45. Do you think God can be manifested in ...? b. animals

var.name: Q45c
var.labl: Q45. Do you think God can be manifested in ...? c. people

var.name: Q46a
var.labl: Q46. Do you think God can be manifested in people who …? a. belong to a lower caste

var.name: Q46b
var.labl: Q46. Do you think God can be manifested in people who …? b. have done bad things in their life

var.name: Q47a
var.labl: Q47. Do you ever ask God for … for you or your family? a. good health

var.name: Q47b
var.labl: Q47. Do you ever ask God for … for you or your family? b. prosperity

var.name: Q47c
var.labl: Q47. Do you ever ask God for … for you or your family? c. forgiveness

var.name: Q48a
var.labl: Q48. Do you participate in celebrations of …? a. Christmas

var.name: Q48b
var.labl: Q48. Do you participate in celebrations of …? b. Eid

var.name: Q48c
var.labl: Q48. Do you participate in celebrations of …? c. Diwali

var.name: Q48d
var.labl: Q48. Do you participate in celebrations of …? d. Holi

var.name: Q48e
var.labl: Q48. Do you participate in celebrations of …? e. Valentine's Day

var.name: Q48f
var.labl: Q48. Do you participate in celebrations of …? f. Independence Day (15 August)

var.name: Q49a
var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? a. in the “evil eye”

var.name: Q49b
var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? b. in reincarnation

var.name: Q49c
var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? c. in fate

var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? d. in astrology

var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? e. that magic, sorcery or witchcraft can influence people's lives

var.name: Q49f
var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? f. in miracles

var.name: Q49g
var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? g. in Heaven

var.name: Q49h
var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? h. in Judgement Day

var.name: Q49i
var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? i. in Nirvana

var.name: Q49j
var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? j. in Moksha

var.name: Q49k
var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? k. in Kaivalya

var.name: Q49l
var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? l. in Karma

var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? m. in angels or benevolent spirits

var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? n. in demons or evil spirits

var.name: Q49o
var.labl: Q49. Do you believe …? o. that the Ganges has the power to purify

var.name: Q50
var.labl: Q50. How often do you read or listen to recitations of religious books [, for example, the Bhagavad Gita/the Quran/the Bible/the Guru Granth Sahib/the Sutras]?

var.name: Q51
var.labl: Q51. Which comes closest to your view? The [Bhagavad Gita/Quran/Bible/Guru Granth Sahib/Sutras/sacred text of your religion] …?

catgry.labl: Is not the word of God

var.name: Q52
var.labl: Q52. Which of these two statements is closest to your opinion?

catgry.labl: There is only ONE true way to interpret the teachings of my religion [OR]
There is MORE than one true way to interpret the teachings of my religion

var.name: Q53a
var.labl: Q53. Do you perform puja …? a. at home

var.name: Q53b
var.labl: Q53. Do you perform puja …? b. at temple

var.name: Q54a
var.labl: Q54a. Do you [pray/offer namaz] …?

var.name: Q54b
var.labl: Q54b. Do you pray all five namaz every day?

var.name: Q55a
var.labl: Q55a. Are you a vegetarian?

var.labl: Q56. Would you ever eat food …? a. in a restaurant that serves both vegetarian and non-vegetarian food

var.name: Q56b
var.labl: Q56. Would you ever eat food …? b. in the home of a friend or neighbor who is non-vegetarian

var.name: Q56c

var.name: Q56d

var.name: Q57c
var.labl: Q57. How important is it for you to have …? c. a religious [INSERT: “burial” IF MUSLIM OR CHRISTIAN; INSERT “cremation” IF NOT MUSLIM OR CHRISTIAN] for your loved ones

var.name: Q58xb
